ygData.subject: Re: Hollow Skull
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard or read somewhere that the skull when combined with two rubies would create an item usable by a Wizard.  One ruby is suppose to be located in the
ygData.messageBody:
I heard or read somewhere that the skull when combined with two rubies would
create an item usable by a Wizard. One ruby is suppose to be located in the
Innothule Swamp on a Troll npc I believe. The other I am not sure. If
anyone has completed this quest I'd like to know what the outcome was. I
plan on attempting this quest as soon as I make a few more levels.

Hope this helps.


Aljernon of Karana
18th Level Wizard



From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>


I just bought a Hollow Skull. Got it on an impulse for 5pp, not really
knowing what it's for.

It's a container with two spots and a combine button. Does anyone have
any idea what it's for?

--
Qenelin
